Pointers in C

August 2019 C Misc

int a = 5;
int *ip = NULL;

printf("%p\n", ip);
// 0x0

// store address of a in ip
ip = &a;

printf("%p\n", &a);
// 0x7ffee73d9608
printf("%p\n", ip);
// 0x7ffee73d9608

// dereference
printf("%d\n", *ip);
// 5
